overview: Have you ever already seen a movie where each scene has something special? In agree with Man's Art®/Skater-Boys® movies, Marcel Bruckmann offers scenes with particularly cool models. This movie is characterized by a nice mixture of different guys. That means that you will find with certainly your favorite model and you will appreciate what models do on the set. In this movie Top-class actors like the Man's Art®/Skater-Boys® stars Ronald Laska, Kriss Stahl and Adrian Winter, are surrounded by 10 new models!!! We have reason to think that 4 of them should be named "new future Man's Art® stars". One of them is Adrian Winter's boy-friend Mark Damon, the second one is the slim blond guy Peer Paulus, third is Felix Wallace and the last but not least George Michaelo.
title: Boys Don't Cry
